actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow small businesses and certain farming operations to claim a credit against income tax in lieu of a deduction for social security taxes paid by such businesses and farming operations.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow employers who operate a small business or farming operation with gross income of $500,000 or less an income tax credit for 40 percent of their social security employer tax liability.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow small businesses and certain farming operations to claim a credit against income tax in lieu of a deduction for social security taxes paid by such businesses and farming operations.
